mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bucketlist (user_id, title, description, display_order) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, COALESCE( (SELECT MAX(b.display_order) + 1 FROM (SELECT * FROM bucketlist) AS b WHERE b.user_id = #{userId}), 1 ) )
mapper.update: UPDATE bucketlist SET completion_status = NOT completion_status, completed_at = CASE WHEN completed_at IS NULL THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ELSE completed_at END WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bucketlist WHERE completion_status AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bucketlist WHERE NOT completion_status AND user_id = #{userId}
